channel.title: What is a dedicated server
channel.description: i know a dedicated server runs your server 24/7 but how and what do i do to ge one how much will it cst and will i hav estill full ocntrol of my server also what do hosters actually do ?>....ty

item.title: What is a dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

spowned:

kk cheer sweet but is a hoster kinda the same?

Define what do you mean by a hoster? Theres many types of hoster you could host it off of your internet. But a dedicated hoster would be the way to go if you want a server that can go to 100+ players.

Read full topic

item.title: What is a dedicated server
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“zammyking111, post:7, topic:193424”][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=257454.msg2139345#msg2139345 date=1206657010]

People do it and they usually are really good server but it depends on your coding experience.
[/quote]What does coding experience have to do with dedicated server? Nothing.

Coding experience has to do alot with a dedicated server because if you suck at coding then why would you even get a dedicated server to begin with. And they arnt really a waste of money if you can code good servers that people will enjoy and then you can possibly make advertise a website and you can make money off of your website for staters.
End Of Disscussion ;)[/quote]Ah, true. Haha, ya. I don’t think anybody on Mopar should have ANY use at all for a dedicated server, with an average player rate of 20-50.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 11:33:31 AM[/size][hr][quote=“spowned, post:8, topic:193424”]kk cheer sweet but is a hoster kinda the same?[/quote]No… A hoster is anybody who runs the server. So, it’s the person who clicks the all-powerful runserver.bat.

Read full topic

[quote=“spowned, post:1, topic:193424”]i know a dedicated server runs your server 24/7 but how and what do i do to ge one how much will it cst and will i hav estill full ocntrol of my server also what do hosters actually do ?>…ty[/quote]Lol, you want to pay $125+ to host a server? Okay, go ahead.

Dedicated servers are super-powered servers that are awesome for hosting your server 24/7, but cost a shitload of money.
